title: Your New Home Awaits! Lease Today Before It's Gone!!
posting_body: ['Exercise Easily in Your New Home!', 'Luxury Apartments in Bellevue, Washington', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 49', 'OR Text', '49', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact us.', 'Overlook at Lakemont', '5305 Lakemont Blvd SE, Bellevue, WA, 98006', 'Visit This Website to See More:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 862 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Ready to embrace vacation-inspired living in Bellevue, WA?', 'The modern one, two, and three bedroom apartments at Overlook at Lakemont come in a variety of spacious, pet-friendly floor plans for rent in King County near Issaquah.', 'This quiet suburban oasis is just minutes from I-90 and a host of shops, restaurants, and recreation destinations.', 'Our interiors were designed to elevate and streamline your day-to-day with features that are equal parts form and function, like walk-in closets, a fireplace, and a private patio or balcony, while our onsite amenities like a swimming pool and hot tub will help you kick back and relax.', 'Live it up, wind it down, or take life at whatever pace you desire – your new home delivers the lifestyle you’ve been searching for.', 'Experience your best life at Overlook at Lakemont.', 'Features', '- Ceiling Fan', '- Bay Windows', '- Granite Breakfast Bar', '- Dishwasher', '- Walk-In Closets', '- Fireplace', '- Full-Size Washer & Dryer', '- Private Patio or Balcony', 'Community Amenities', '- Resort-Style Swimming Pool & Spa', '- Fire Pit w/ Lounge Seating', '- Basketball Court', '- Outdoor Pizza Oven & BBQ Area', '- Pet Wash Station', '- Pet-Friendly', '- Bike Repair Station', '- Game Room', '- 24-Hour Management & Maintenance', '- Online Rental Payments', '- Shuffleboard & Air Hockey', '- 24-Hour Fitness Center', '- Bocce Ball Court', '- Playground', '- Resident Clubhouse w/ Pool Tables', '- Sundeck & Outdoor Lounge Area', 'Pet Policy', 'At Overlook at Lakemont, we know just how much you love your furry friends.', 'Our spacious layouts and light-filled rooms are the perfect place for your pets.', 'As a pet-friendly community in Bellevue, Washington, we encourage you to bring your canine or feline friends with you.', 'For more information on our pet policy, contact our friendly leasing team today.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'kcrRieD6y9CX']
